rooms.name: Lobby & Living Area
rooms.description: A grand entrance space combined with a living area that embodies Art Deco elegance, featuring geometric patterns and vintage detailing. Floor-to-ceiling windows allow for abundant natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An integrated dining area adjacent to the living space with Art Deco inspired fixtures, ensuring a seamless flow of space.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Utility
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed in an Art Deco style with efficient workflow, incorporating ample storage and contemporary appliances. The design includes a small utility area for cleaning supplies.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace with built-in shelves and ergonomic furniture that follows Vastu principles by being placed in the northeast corner, ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom (Multipurpose)
rooms.description: Serving as a guest room or home office extension when needed. Decorated with subtle Art Deco accents and Vastu compliant layout.

openings.description: A grand foyer that welcomes visitors, incorporating large French doors complemented by floor-to-ceiling windows on adjacent walls, promoting natural light and a welcoming atmosphere.
Provides an alternative access point to the bungalow, designed for service or emergency exits, with ample door clearance.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom designed in a minimalist Art Deco style, with built-in wardrobes and floor-to-ceiling windows for privacy while letting in natural light. Vastu principles ensure the placement of bed in the optimal direction.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: An en-suite bathroom with contemporary fixtures, designed to complement the master bedroom with subtle Art Deco finishes and Vastu aligned layout.

openings.description: A centrally located staircase with elegant handrails that connects ground floor and upper floor, designed following Vastu norms to maintain balance.
A skylight placed in the living space for additional natural light, promoting energy flow as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A serene rooftop terrace designed with Art Deco accents and modern landscaping. It features comfortable seating, a water feature, and ample greenery for relaxation and enhanced energy flow.

openings.description: An access point to the rooftop terrace that aligns with Vastu principles by being centrally located, ensuring a balanced transition from interior living spaces to outdoor relaxation areas.

notes.vastu_considerations: Key areas such as home office and master bedroom are placed in the northeast and southeast corners respectively, adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy flow. The design maintains harmony with local building norms and maximizes natural light using floor-to-ceiling windows.
